attributes.title: Keeping Yourself Hungry And Awake Will Absolutely Heal All Physical And Mental Problems!
attributes.description:
Satsang Delivered on 23 February 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE TODAY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*ALMOST ALL OF YOUR EXPERIENCE OF YOUR LIFE HAPPENS IN THE ZONE OF CHEMICAL AND HORMONES, MEMORIES AND EMOTIONS.

*TYAGA IS A SINGLE SOLE, MOST POWERFUL CATALYST AGENT TO TRANSFORM YOUR ATMA INTO PARAMATMA, SOUL INTO COSMIC SOUL, SHAVA INTO PARAMASHIVA, YOUR INDIVIDUAL EXISTENCE TO PARAMASHIVA.

*TYAGA BRINGS INTENSE FOCUS TO YOUR ULTIMATE REALITY. STRUGGLE IS NOT WRONG IN YOUR PATH TO KAILASA - ENLIGHTENMENT. BUT LOSING FOCUS IS SOMETHING SERIOUSLY WRONG. IF YOU LOST FOCUS, YOU LOST EVERYTHING.

*YOU MAY BE STRUGGLING WITH YOUR PARAMASHIVA SPACE. IT MAY BE BECAUSE OF YOUR LUST OR HUNGER PATTERN. BUT YOU ARE STRUGGLING WITH WILL PERSISTENCE. THEN WHEN YOU LEAVE THE BODY, THESE TWO PATTERNS WILL BECOME IRRELEVANT AND PURE PARAMASHIVA STANDS AND YOU MERGE WITH HIM! THAT IS WHY STRUGGLING IS NOT A CRIME. BUT IF YOU COME TO THE CONCLUSION, ‘I AM NOT ABLE TO DO ANYTHING. I STRUGGLED WITH THIS FOR 25 YEARS LIKE ANYTHING' AND YOU CONSCIOUSLY DECIDE NOT TO PERSIST, THEN THAT IS THE REAL PROBLEM. IF YOU CONTINUE TO PERSIST WITHOUT GIVING UP, THESE PATTERNS WILL BECOME IRRELEVANT.

*ACTUALLY, ALL PATTERNS ARE IRRELEVANT WHEN YOU LEAVE THE BODY, BUT THE DECISIONS YOU MAKE, HOW YOU HANDLED AND COGNISED YOUR HORMONES AND PATTERNS RELATED TO IT, THAT PATTERN OF YOUR WILL PERSISTENCE IS GOING TO COME WITH YOU AND IT WILL AFFECT YOU ASSUMING THE NEXT BODY. SO, IF YOU DON'T GIVE UP DURING YOUR STRUGGLE, THE PATTERNS WILL BECOME IRRELEVANT. WHEN THEY BECOME IRRELEVANT, THEN BECAUSE YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR YEARNING FOR PARAMASHIVA, YOU WILL BECOME ONE WITH HIM!

*STRUGGLES ARE NOT WRONG. GIVING UP OR FEELING IT IS NOT POSSIBLE IS WRONG. THE DEMON IN YOU IS SOMETIMES SO STRONG, YOU WILL FEEL IT IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR ANYONE AND ANYONE WHO TEACHES THE PARAMASHIVA JNANA IS A CHEAT!

*RAVANA MAYBE AN ASURA BUT NEVER A RAKSHASA. HE WAS MAYBE STRUGGLING WITH HIS LUST PATTERN, BUT HE NEVER FELT PARAMASHIVA JNANA WAS NOT POSSIBLE FOR HIM OR FOR THE UNIVERSE. I AM NOT SAYING RAVANA IS RIGHT. I AM SAYING, ‘BEFORE TELLING HE IS WRONG, YOU PLEASE BECOME RIGHT AND THEN TELL RAVANA IS WRONG,’ THAT’S ALL!

*JANANSAMBANDAR PERUMAN IS MY GURU MUDALVAR. ALL AADHEENAMS WILL HAVE TWO HISTORIES 1) HISTORY FROM KAILASA, THE TIRUKKAILAYA PARAMBARAI VARALARU - TILL THE PERSON WHO IS KNOWN IN THE MODERN HISTORY. THAT PERSON IS THEN CONSIDERED AS THE GURU MUDALVAR FOR THAT AADHEENAM. FOR MADURAI AADEENAM JNANASAMBANDAR IS CONSIDERED THE GURU MUDALVAR. BUT AS PER STHANA VARALARU IT GOES MUCH BEYOND HIM. THERE IS EVIDENCE TO SHOW THAT MEENAKSHI HERSELF IS A HISTORICAL FIGURE AND NOT JUST A MYTHICAL FIGURE.

*MY GURU MUDALVAR JNANASAMBANDAR, IN HIS EVERY PATHIGAM SINGS ABOUT RAVANA LIFTING KAILASA! IT MEANS, RAVANA WAS GIVEN SO MUCH IMPORTANCE AMONG THE DEVOTEES. EVEN WHEN HE WAS STRUGGLING, HE DID NOT DENY THE POSSIBILITY FOR HIMSELF OR FOR WORLD.

*BUT THE TRIPURASAS, BECAUSE THEY WERE STRUGGLING, NOT ONLY THEY DENIED THE POSSIBILITY FOR THEMSELVES, THEY STARTED TELLING THE WHOLE WORLD THAT IT IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR ANYONE. THEY ARE RAKSHASAS! THEY SHOULD BE DESTROYED AND NEVER BE GLORIFIED.

*IF YOU REMOVE THE ‘KIDNAPPING OF SITA’ EPISODE FROM RAMAYANA, RAVANA IS AN ABSOLUTE HERO! ON THE LAST DAY, BEFORE ENTERING INTO THE WAR, HE DOES PUJA TO HIS ATMA LINGA, WEARS IT AND GOES FOR WAR. THAT IS WHY VIBHEESHANA SAYS, ‘DON'T SEND ARROWS TO RAVANA’S CHEST, THE ATMA LINGA WILL SAVE HIM!’ ANYWAY, LEAVE THAT. EVEN WHEN YOU ARE STRUGGLING, DON'T GO TO THE ‘LOW’ OF THE TRIPURASURAS. DENYING THE POSSIBILITY FOR YOURSELF AND OTHERS IS AN EXTREME.

*PARAMASHIVA JNANA IS POSSIBLE FOR YOU, AND FOR THE WHOLE UNIVERSE. GURU IS THE STATEMENT FROM PARAMASHIVA THAT IT IS POSSIBLE FOR THE INDIVIDUAL AND FOR THE UNIVERSE. AN INCARNATION IS A DIRECT MANIFESTATION OF PARAMASHIVA WHO ‘MAKES IT POSSIBLE’ THROUGH POWERFUL INITIATIONS, METHODS AND BY CREATING AN AMBIENCE.

*EVERY TEMPLE IS THE AMBIENCE, ECOSYSTEM. WHY DO YOU THINK I INSIST ON WORSHIPING THE 363 NAYANMARS? BECAUSE IF YOU READ THEIR LIFE STORIES, YOU WILL UNDERSTAND HOW YOU SHOULD KEEP THE ECOSYSTEM ALIVE.
